subject: [Radiance-general] International Radiance Workshop Reminder
body:
Hello Everyone,

I want to remind everyone that registration is open for the International Radiance Workshop.  The workshop is August 22-24 at Lawrence Berkeley National Lab in Berkeley, CA.
We've posted a tentative agenda on that website.  The website is here: http://radiance.lbl.gov/

Please register as soon as possible, we need to have an idea of how many people to expect to plan appropriately.

Thanks,
Andy
